verses.verse: וַ֭יַּעַן <WH6030> Then answered אֱלִיפַ֥ז <WH464> Eliphaz הַֽתֵּימָנִ֗י <WH8489> the Temanite וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <WH559> and said
הֶֽחָכָ֗ם <WH2450> Should a wise man יַעֲנֶ֥ה <WH6030> utter דַֽעַת־ <WH1847> knowledge ר֑וּחַ <WH7307> vain וִֽימַלֵּ֖א <WH4390> and fill קָדִ֣ים <WH6921> the east בִּטְנֽוֹ׃ <WH990> his belly

הוֹכֵ֣חַ <WH3198> Should he reason בְּ֭דָבָר <WH1697> talk לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יִסְכּ֑וֹן <WH5532> with unprofitable וּ֝מִלִּ֗ים <WH4405> words לֹא־ <WH3808> no יוֹעִ֥יל <WH3276> wherewith he can do no good בָּֽם׃

אַף־ <WH637> Indeed אַ֭תָּה <WH859> you תָּפֵ֣ר <WH6565> Yea thou castest off יִרְאָ֑ה <WH3374> fear וְתִגְרַ֥ע <WH1639> and restrainest שִׂ֝יחָ֗ה <WH7881> prayer לִפְנֵי־ <WH6440> before אֵֽל׃ <WH410> God

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for יְאַלֵּ֣ף <WH502> uttereth עֲוֹנְךָ֣ <WH5771> thine iniquity פִ֑יךָ <WH6310> For thy mouth וְ֝תִבְחַ֗ר <WH977> and thou choosest לְשׁ֣וֹן <WH3956> the tongue עֲרוּמִֽים׃ <WH6175> of the crafty
יַרְשִֽׁיעֲךָ֣ <WH7561> condemneth פִ֣יךָ <WH6310> Thine own mouth וְלֹא־ <WH3808> and not אָ֑נִי <WH589> I וּ֝שְׂפָתֶ֗יךָ <WH8193> thee and not I yea thine own lips יַעֲנוּ־ <WH6030> testify בָֽךְ׃
הֲרִאישׁ֣וֹן <WH7223> the first אָ֭דָם <WH120> man תִּוָּלֵ֑ד <WH3205> [that] was born וְלִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before גְבָע֣וֹת <WH1389> hill חוֹלָֽלְתָּ׃ <WH2342> ? or wast thou made
הַבְס֣וֹד <WH5475> the secret אֱל֣וֹהַ <WH433> of God תִּשְׁמָ֑ע <WH8085> Hast thou heard וְתִגְרַ֖ע <WH1639> and limit אֵלֶ֣יךָ <WH413> about חָכְמָֽה׃ <WH2451> wisdom

מַה־ <WH4100> What יָּ֭דַעְתָּ <WH3045> What knowest וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not נֵדָ֑ע <WH3045> thou that we know תָּ֝בִ֗ין <WH995> not? [what] understandest וְֽלֹא־ <WH3808> not עִמָּ֥נוּ <WH5973> with הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

גַּם־ <WH1571> Both שָׂ֣ב <WH7867> With us [are] both the grayheaded גַּם־ <WH1571> Both יָשִׁ֣ישׁ <WH3453> and very aged בָּ֑נוּ כַּבִּ֖יר <WH3524> men much מֵאָבִ֣יךָ <WH1> than thy father יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> elder

הַמְעַ֣ט <WH4592> small מִ֭מְּךָ <WH4480> too תַּנְחֻמ֣וֹת <WH8575> [Are] the consolations אֵ֑ל <WH410> of God וְ֝דָבָ֗ר <WH1697> thing לָאַ֥ט <WH328> with thee? is there any secret עִמָּֽךְ׃ <WH5973> with
מַה־ <WH4100> Why יִּקָּחֲךָ֥ <WH3947> carry thee away לִבֶּ֑ךָ <WH3820> Why doth thine heart וּֽמַה־ <WH4100> and why יִּרְזְמ֥וּן <WH7335> wink at עֵינֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5869> ? and what do thy eyes

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for תָשִׁ֣יב <WH7725> That thou turnest אֶל־ <WH413> against אֵ֣ל <WH410> against God רוּחֶ֑ךָ <WH7307> thy spirit וְהֹצֵ֖אתָ <WH3318> go out מִפִּ֣יךָ <WH6310> according מִלִּֽין׃ <WH4405> and lettest [such] words

מָֽה־ <WH4100> What אֱנ֥וֹשׁ <WH582> What [is] man כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יִזְכֶּ֑ה <WH2135> that he should be clean וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> for יִ֝צְדַּ֗ק <WH6663> that he should be righteous יְל֣וּד <WH3205> ? and [he which is] born אִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> of a woman

הֵ֣ן <WH2005> Behold [בִּקְדֹשֹׁו כ] (בִּ֭קְדֹשָׁיו <WH6918> holy ק) לֹ֣א <WH3808> no יַאֲמִ֑ין <WH539> Behold he putteth no trust וְ֝שָׁמַ֗יִם <WH8064> yea the heavens לֹא־ <WH3808> no זַכּ֥וּ <WH2141> are not clean בְעֵינָֽיו׃ <WH5869> in his sight

אַ֭ף <WH637> How כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נִתְעָ֥ב <WH8581> How much more abominable וְֽנֶאֱלָ֑ח <WH444> and filthy אִישׁ־ <WH376> [is] man שֹׁתֶ֖ה <WH8354> which drinketh כַמַּ֣יִם <WH4325> water עַוְלָֽה׃ <WH5766> iniquity
אֲחַוְךָ֥ <WH2331> I will shew שְֽׁמַֽע־ <WH8085> thee hear לִ֑י וְזֶֽה־ <WH2088> and what חָ֝זִ֗יתִי <WH2372> me and that [which] I have seen וַאֲסַפֵּֽרָה׃ <WH5608> I will declare
אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> What חֲכָמִ֥ים <WH2450> Which wise יַגִּ֑ידוּ <WH5046> men have told וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not כִֽ֝חֲד֗וּ <WH3582> and have not hid מֵאֲבוֹתָֽם׃ <WH1> from their fathers

לָהֶ֣ם לְ֭בַדָּם <WH905> alone נִתְּנָ֣ה <WH5414> was given הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> Unto whom alone the earth וְלֹא־ <WH3808> and no עָ֖בַר <WH5674> passed זָ֣ר <WH2114> and no stranger בְּתוֹכָֽם׃ <WH8432> among

כָּל־ <WH3605> all יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> with pain all [his] days רָ֭שָׁע <WH7563> The wicked ה֣וּא <WH1931> he מִתְחוֹלֵ֑ל <WH2342> man travaileth וּמִסְפַּ֥ר <WH4557> and the number שָׁ֝נִ֗ים <WH8141> of years נִצְפְּנ֥וּ <WH6845> is hidden לֶעָרִֽיץ׃ <WH6184> to the oppressor
קוֹל־ <WH6963> sound פְּחָדִ֥ים <WH6343> A dreadful בְּאָזְנָ֑יו <WH241> [is] in his ears בַּ֝שָּׁל֗וֹם <WH7965> in prosperity שׁוֹדֵ֥ד <WH7703> the destroyer יְבוֹאֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH935> shall come

לֹא־ <WH3808> does not יַאֲמִ֣ין <WH539> He believeth שׁ֭וּב <WH7725> not that he shall return מִנִּי־ <WH4480> from חֹ֑שֶׁךְ <WH2822> out of darkness [וְצָפוּ כ] (וְצָפ֖וּי <WH6822> behold ק) ה֣וּא <WH1931> he אֱלֵי־ <WH413> for חָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> for of the sword

נֹ֘דֵ֤ד <WH5074> He wandereth abroad ה֣וּא <WH1931> he לַלֶּ֣חֶם <WH3899> for bread אַיֵּ֑ה <WH344> kite יָדַ֓ע ׀ <WH3045> [saying] Where [is it]? he knoweth כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נָכ֖וֹן <WH3559> is ready בְּיָד֣וֹ <WH3027> at his hand יֽוֹם־ <WH3117> that the day חֹֽשֶׁךְ׃ <WH2822> of darkness

יְֽ֭בַעֲתֻהוּ <WH1204> shall make him afraid צַ֣ר <WH6862> Trouble וּמְצוּקָ֑ה <WH4691> and anguish תִּ֝תְקְפֵ֗הוּ <WH8630> they shall prevail כְּמֶ֤לֶךְ ׀ <WH4428> against him as a king עָתִ֬יד <WH6264> ready לַכִּידֽוֹר׃ <WH3593> to the battle

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because נָטָ֣ה <WH5186> For he stretcheth out אֶל־ <WH413> against אֵ֣ל <WH410> against God יָד֑וֹ <WH3027> his hand וְאֶל־ <WH413> against שַׁ֝דַּ֗י <WH7706> himself against the Almighty יִתְגַּבָּֽר׃ <WH1396> and strengtheneth
יָר֣וּץ <WH7323> He runneth אֵלָ֣יו <WH413> about בְּצַוָּ֑אר <WH6677> upon him [even] on [his] neck בַּ֝עֲבִ֗י <WH5672> upon the thick גַּבֵּ֥י <WH1354> bosses מָֽגִנָּֽיו׃ <WH4043> of his bucklers

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for כִסָּ֣ה <WH3680> Because he covereth פָנָ֣יו <WH6440> his face בְּחֶלְבּ֑וֹ <WH2459> with his fatness וַיַּ֖עַשׂ <WH6213> and maketh פִּימָ֣ה <WH6371> collops of fat עֲלֵי־ <WH5921> and כָֽסֶל׃ <WH3689> on [his] flanks

וַיִּשְׁכּ֤וֹן ׀ <WH7931> And he dwelleth עָ֘רִ֤ים <WH5892> cities נִכְחָד֗וֹת <WH3582> in desolate בָּ֭תִּים <WH1004> [and] in houses לֹא־ <WH3808> no יֵ֣שְׁבוּ <WH3427> which no man inhabiteth לָ֑מוֹ אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> Which הִתְעַתְּד֣וּ <WH6257> which are ready לְגַלִּֽים׃ <WH1530> to become heaps

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor יֶ֭עְשַׁר <WH6238> He shall not be rich וְלֹא־ <WH3808> nor יָק֣וּם <WH6965> continue חֵיל֑וֹ <WH2428> neither shall his substance וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor יִטֶּ֖ה <WH5186> neither shall he prolong לָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> thereof upon the earth מִנְלָֽם׃ <WH4512> the perfection

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> He will not יָס֨וּר ׀ <WH5493> He shall not depart מִנִּי־ <WH4480> from חֹ֗שֶׁךְ <WH2822> out of darkness יֹֽ֭נַקְתּוֹ <WH3127> his branches תְּיַבֵּ֣שׁ <WH3001> shall dry up שַׁלְהָ֑בֶת <WH7957> the flame וְ֝יָס֗וּר <WH5493> shall he go away בְּר֣וּחַ <WH7307> and by the breath פִּֽיו׃ <WH6310> of his mouth

אַל־ <WH408> nay יַאֲמֵ֣ן <WH539> trust [בַּשֹּׁו כ] (בַּשָּׁ֣יו <WH7723> emptiness ק) נִתְעָ֑ה <WH8582> Let not him that is deceived כִּי־ <WH3588> in שָׁ֝֗וְא <WH7723> in vanity תִּהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become תְמוּרָתֽוֹ׃ <WH8545> shall be his recompence
בְּֽלֹא־ <WH3808> before י֭וֹמוֹ <WH3117> his time תִּמָּלֵ֑א <WH4390> It shall be accomplished וְ֝כִפָּת֗וֹ <WH3712> and his branch לֹ֣א <WH3808> before רַעֲנָֽנָה׃ <WH7488> shall not be green

יַחְמֹ֣ס <WH2554> He shall shake off כַּגֶּ֣פֶן <WH1612> as the vine בִּסְר֑וֹ <WH1154> his unripe grape וְיַשְׁלֵ֥ךְ <WH7993> and shall cast off כַּ֝זַּ֗יִת <WH2132> as the olive נִצָּתֽוֹ׃ <WH5328> his flower

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For עֲדַ֣ת <WH5712> For the congregation חָנֵ֣ף <WH2611> of hypocrites גַּלְמ֑וּד <WH1565> [shall be] desolate וְ֝אֵ֗שׁ <WH784> and fire אָכְלָ֥ה <WH398> shall consume אָֽהֳלֵי־ <WH168> the tabernacles שֹֽׁחַד׃ <WH7810> of bribery

הָרֹ֣ה <WH2029> They conceive עָ֭מָל <WH5999> mischief וְיָ֣לֹד <WH3205> and bring forth אָ֑וֶן <WH205> vanity וּ֝בִטְנָ֗ם <WH990> and their belly תָּכִ֥ין <WH3559> prepareth מִרְמָֽה׃ <WH4820> deceit ס
